WorkItem.Description: Is there a way to get Tuskarr's back in my boots enchant list? Not showing up in the boomkin enchant list. In fact several enchants disappeared in the current release.
WorkItem.Summary: [Moonkin] Tuskarr's Vitality not showing in enchant list

Comments.Message: Since he didn't create the issue for it, I went ahead and did it.  This is due to my removal of irrelevant stats from Moonkin.  Stamina isn't technically relevant, and run speed isn't modeled, which made the enchant disappear from the list.  This is probably the case for most of the other disappearing enchants.

For that matter, what other enchants disappeared?  It'd be good to know, as most of the major ones should still be there.  My guess it's probably things like hit to gloves, which disappeared likely due to attempting to filter out stupid generic items like the Librarian's Papercutter.
Every model should have things like MovementSpeed marked as relevant, even if it isn't being modeled. That way they at least show up.

Or solve relevancy the way Retribution currently does it.   It only works of stuff you know, and doesn't remove something because there's stats on there that you aren't modelling, it's a more robust approach in the long run as it won't automatically remove new items that have new (unmodelled) stats.

Just checked my calendar for today, and I may have the free spot to work on that post I've been planning to do for so long now >.<
Resto Shamans and Elemental Shamans also use Tuskarr's. Is there a way to manually add it to the enchant list for a specific character?

Yes, please add the end-game enchants for run speed increase or any other end-game enchant for any slot. Please give us a little flexibility for enchanting to suit our GM's requirements, or to fill in insufficiencies for our gear.  For example, my raiding guild asks almost all classes to put Tuskarr's Vitality on their boots. It is very useful when dashing out of the way of ICC AoE's... and so currently I am not selecting any enchant for boots, since you don't have the one I am required to use.
Resto Druid....

Well, I don't exactly have any control over resto druids, but I will add MovementSpeed to Moonkin for the next release.  Are there any others that I'm missing?  Also, I will look into the possibility of remodeling the relevant stats calculations to prevent stupid things like this...  Even though this bug is a result of me redoing them once already. >.>
Fixed in source, as well as the Nitro Boosts engineering enchant.  If there are any others, please let me know.
